entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: The invisibility cloak is used by Harry and Ginny to hide from the crowd. ("He threw the Invisibility Cloak over both of them")

entities.name: garroting gas
entities.description: Garroting Gas is a type of gas that has been released, causing people to be unable to see. ("someone’s let off Garroting Gas just along here")

entities.name: ginnys voice
entities.description: Ginny's voice is used to convince the crowd that the gas is real. ("That’s because it’s colorless," sa id Ginny in a convincingly exasperated voice, "but if you want to walk through it, carry on, then we’ll have your body as proof for the next idiot who didn’t believe us.")

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of the people trying to get Harry and Ginny down from the fire. ("I think that’s as good as we’re going to get,  Harry — come on, let’s do it.")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the people trying to get down from the fire. ("I think that’s as good as we’re going to get,  Harry — come on, let’s do it.")

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is one of the people trying to get down from the fire. ("You can’t come down here!" Ginny was calling to the crowd.)

entities.name: crowd
entities.description: The crowd is a group of people who are trying to get down from the fire. ("You can’t come down here!" Ginny was calling to the crowd.)

entities.name: bust
entities.description: The bust is a statue that is in front of them, and they are listening carefully to its Latin mumblings. ("They stood listening carefully over the Latin mumblings of the bust in front of them.")

entities.name: staircase
entities.description: The swiveling staircase is a way for people to get down from the fire, but it's not being used because of the gas. ("No, sorry, you’re going to have to go round by the swiveling staircase")
